Package de.jreality.tutorial.util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FlyTool
    This tool is designed to sit "above" the camera in the "ship" or "avatar" node and "fly" in the direction determined by the "PointerShipTransformation" (PST) virtual device.
